content: when i was learning to crochet i was always searching for free patterns that i could practice with at my level i wrote this pattern with that in mind a simple pattern that incorporates the most basic shapes of amigurumi that can be made by novice and expert alike **this is the basic pattern for the itty little kitty ** this is a free download and great for a beginner in crochet it includes all the body part directions but not the color changes **calico & tuxedo version** if you would like to purchase the instructions for the color changes for the calico and tuxedo or love the simple pattern so much you want to buy me a caffinated beverage it is available in my ravelry store here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/itty-little-kitties 1 **cat hulhu version also available ** tentacle kitty just gives snuggier cuddles https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/itty-little-cathulhu-the-cat-octopus 2 materials required 3mm hook tapestry needle for sewing marbles/rocks/etc for added weight optional 12mm - 15mm safety eyes 8mm safety nose optional doll stuffing these itty little kitties can be made with any yarn as long as you use a hook small enough that there are no gaps between the stitches i used both red heart super saver and vanna s choice thank you for loving these itty little kitties as much as i do 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/itty-little-kitties 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/itty-little-cathulhu-the-cat-octopus
